title: Ohr Sameach on Mishneh Torah, Service on the Day of Atonement

enDesc: Rabbi Meir Simcha of Dvinsk's commentary on Rambam's Mishneh Torah, in which he exhibits the great breadth of his knowledge as he tries to resolve apparent contradictions found in Mishneh Torah.
